column1: Narrator : The island is so vast you don’t see the end of it. And yet, it seems completely empty.
Narrator : On the beach : « Food & drinks » is written on a wooden sign.

column2: Choice : Show me what you sell. (trade)
column10: Choice : Tell me about the ocean !

column4: OtherSpeak : I haven’t heard about it.
column8: OtherSpeak : You know what they say...
column11: OtherSpeak : I’d prefer we talk business only

column8: OtherSpeak : The bigger the laugh, the bigger the belly!
column13: PlayerSpeak : We killed him! It wasn't too hard.
